templates.name: Battery Indicator
templates.description: Battery-style gauge showing fill level. Intuitive for capacity/remaining indicators.
templates.preview_svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 50 24'><rect x='1' y='4' width='40' height='16' rx='3' fill='none' stroke='%23374151' stroke-width='2'/><rect x='41' y='8' width='4' height='8' rx='1' fill='%23374151'/><rect x='4' y='7' width='27' height='10' rx='1' fill='%2316A34A'/></svg>
templates.dax_template:
{{measure_name}} =
VAR _value = {{value_measure}}
VAR _maxValue = {{max_value}}
VAR _pct = MIN(MAX(_value / _maxValue, 0), 1)
VAR _width = {{width}}
VAR _height = {{height}}
VAR _bodyWidth = _width * 0.85
VAR _bodyHeight = _height * 0.75
VAR _bodyY = (_height - _bodyHeight) / 2
VAR _terminalWidth = _width * 0.08
VAR _terminalHeight = _bodyHeight * 0.5
VAR _terminalY = (_height - _terminalHeight) / 2
VAR _padding = 3
VAR _fillWidth = (_bodyWidth - (2 * _padding)) * _pct
VAR _fillColor =
    SWITCH(
        TRUE(),
        _pct < 0.2, "{{color_critical}}",
        _pct < 0.5, "{{color_warning}}",
        "{{color_good}}"
    )
VAR _svg = "<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 " & _width & " " & _height & "'><rect x='1' y='" & _bodyY & "' width='" & _bodyWidth & "' height='" & _bodyHeight & "' rx='3' fill='none' stroke='{{color_outline}}' stroke-width='2'/><rect x='" & (_bodyWidth + 1) & "' y='" & _terminalY & "' width='" & _terminalWidth & "' height='" & _terminalHeight & "' rx='1' fill='{{color_outline}}'/><rect x='" & (1 + _padding) & "' y='" & (_bodyY + _padding) & "' width='" & FORMAT(_fillWidth, "0.0") & "' height='" & (_bodyHeight - (2 * _padding)) & "' rx='1' fill='" & _fillColor & "'/></svg>"
RETURN "data:image/svg+xml;utf8," & _svg

parameters.name: measure_name
parameters.description: Name for the new SVG measure

templates.name: Vertical Battery Indicator
templates.description: Vertical battery-style gauge for column-oriented displays.
templates.preview_svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 24 50'><rect x='4' y='5' width='16' height='40' rx='3' fill='none' stroke='%23374151' stroke-width='2'/><rect x='8' y='1' width='8' height='4' rx='1' fill='%23374151'/><rect x='7' y='18' width='10' height='24' rx='1' fill='%2316A34A'/></svg>
templates.dax_template:
{{measure_name}} =
VAR _value = {{value_measure}}
VAR _maxValue = {{max_value}}
VAR _pct = MIN(MAX(_value / _maxValue, 0), 1)
VAR _width = {{width}}
VAR _height = {{height}}
VAR _bodyWidth = _width * 0.7
VAR _bodyHeight = _height * 0.85
VAR _bodyX = (_width - _bodyWidth) / 2
VAR _terminalWidth = _bodyWidth * 0.5
VAR _terminalHeight = _height * 0.08
VAR _terminalX = (_width - _terminalWidth) / 2
VAR _padding = 3
VAR _fillHeight = (_bodyHeight - (2 * _padding)) * _pct
VAR _fillY = (_height - _terminalHeight) - _padding - _fillHeight
VAR _fillColor =
    SWITCH(
        TRUE(),
        _pct < 0.2, "{{color_critical}}",
        _pct < 0.5, "{{color_warning}}",
        "{{color_good}}"
    )
VAR _svg = "<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 " & _width & " " & _height & "'><rect x='" & _bodyX & "' y='" & _terminalHeight & "' width='" & _bodyWidth & "' height='" & _bodyHeight & "' rx='3' fill='none' stroke='{{color_outline}}' stroke-width='2'/><rect x='" & _terminalX & "' y='0' width='" & _terminalWidth & "' height='" & _terminalHeight & "' rx='1' fill='{{color_outline}}'/><rect x='" & (_bodyX + _padding) & "' y='" & FORMAT(_fillY, "0.0") & "' width='" & (_bodyWidth - (2 * _padding)) & "' height='" & FORMAT(_fillHeight, "0.0") & "' rx='1' fill='" & _fillColor & "'/></svg>"
RETURN "data:image/svg+xml;utf8," & _svg

parameters.name: measure_name
parameters.description: Name for the new SVG measure

templates.name: Thermometer Gauge
templates.description: Thermometer-style vertical gauge with bulb at bottom.
templates.preview_svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 30 60'><rect x='10' y='5' width='10' height='40' rx='5' fill='%23E5E7EB'/><circle cx='15' cy='50' r='8' fill='%23E5E7EB'/><rect x='12' y='20' width='6' height='25' fill='%23DC2626'/><circle cx='15' cy='50' r='6' fill='%23DC2626'/></svg>
templates.dax_template:
{{measure_name}} =
VAR _value = {{value_measure}}
VAR _maxValue = {{max_value}}
VAR _pct = MIN(MAX(_value / _maxValue, 0), 1)
VAR _width = {{width}}
VAR _height = {{height}}
VAR _tubeWidth = _width * 0.35
VAR _tubeX = (_width - _tubeWidth) / 2
VAR _bulbRadius = _width * 0.3
VAR _bulbY = _height - _bulbRadius - 2
VAR _tubeHeight = _bulbY - 5 - (_tubeWidth / 2)
VAR _fillWidth = _tubeWidth * 0.6
VAR _fillX = (_width - _fillWidth) / 2
VAR _fillHeight = _tubeHeight * _pct
VAR _fillY = 5 + (_tubeWidth / 2) + (_tubeHeight - _fillHeight)
VAR _innerBulbRadius = _bulbRadius * 0.75
VAR _svg = "<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 " & _width & " " & _height & "'><rect x='" & _tubeX & "' y='5' width='" & _tubeWidth & "' height='" & _tubeHeight & "' rx='" & (_tubeWidth / 2) & "' fill='{{color_background}}'/><circle cx='" & (_width / 2) & "' cy='" & _bulbY & "' r='" & _bulbRadius & "' fill='{{color_background}}'/><rect x='" & _fillX & "' y='" & FORMAT(_fillY, "0.0") & "' width='" & _fillWidth & "' height='" & FORMAT(_fillHeight + (_bulbY - 5 - _tubeHeight), "0.0") & "' fill='{{color_fill}}'/><circle cx='" & (_width / 2) & "' cy='" & _bulbY & "' r='" & _innerBulbRadius & "' fill='{{color_fill}}'/></svg>"
RETURN "data:image/svg+xml;utf8," & _svg

parameters.name: measure_name
parameters.description: Name for the new SVG measure
